title: Code Kunst plays with 'Fire Water' feat. GSoul & Tablo in new MV teaser! | allkpop.com
text: Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Code Kunst plays with 'Fire Water' feat. GSoul & Tablo in new MV teaser! By elliefilet 7 minutes ago 1,006 0 1 0 SEE ALSO: Tablo fanboys over Chance the Rapper at the Grammy Awards "Fire Water" is a track from Code Kunst's upcoming album ' Muggles' Mansion ' featuring G.Soul and Tablo . The 15-track album also includes collaborations including Lee Hi , BewhY , and Dok2 . The MV teaser reveals a woman drowning in a pool of water, while a monk surrounded by fire looks on.You can expect the full track on February 28 KST! YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
